sentence.content: BFN Fuzhou, June 22 (CNS) -- Flood lasting for ten or more days in Fujian Province has brought about heavy losses in agriculture there.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NNP BFN) (NNP Fuzhou) (, ,) (NNP June) (CD 22)) (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-) (NP (NN CNS)) (-RRB- -RRB-)) (: --) (NP (NP (NNP Flood)) (VP (VBG lasting) (SBAR (IN for) (S (NP (NP (QP (CD ten) (CC or) (JJR more)) (NNS days)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP Fujian) (NNP Province)))) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN brought) (NP (NP (RB about) (JJ heavy) (NNS losses)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN agriculture)))) (ADVP (RB there)))))))) (. .)))

sentence.content: According to the latest information offered by the Provincial Agricultural Bureau, a total area of 2.465 million mu of crops have been hit by the flood and of which, 446 000 mu of crops will have no yield, 1.957 million mu of grain have been heavily hit and some 300 million kilogram grain are expected to be lost.

sentence.content: Among nine cities and prefectures in Fujian, those seriously hit by the flood are Sanming, Nanping, Ningde, Fuzhou, Quanzhou and Putian.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Among) (NP (NP (CD nine) (NNS cities) (CC and) (NNS prefectures)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP Fujian))))) (, ,) (NP (NP (DT those)) (VP (ADVP (RB seriously)) (VBN hit) (PP (IN by) (NP (DT the) (NN flood))))) (VP (VBP are) (NP (NNP Sanming) (, ,) (NNP Nanping) (, ,) (NNP Ningde) (, ,) (NNP Fuzhou) (, ,) (NNP Quanzhou) (CC and) (NNP Putian))) (. .)))

sentence.content: Of these, Sanming City is worst hit by the flood.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Of) (NP (DT these))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Sanming) (NNP City)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (JJS worst)) (VP (VBN hit) (PP (IN by) (NP (DT the) (NN flood)))))) (. .)))

chunking.string: is worst hit by the flood

sentence.content: In May, the city was hit by the heavy rainstorm and had big losses and now it suffers again from the flood with some 600 000 mu of crops damaged by flood and 200 million kilogram grain expected to be lost.
sentence.syntactictree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN In) (NP (NNP May))) (, ,) (S (NP (DT the) (NN city)) (VP (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN hit) (PP (IN by) (NP (DT the) (JJ heavy) (NN rainstorm))))) (CC and) (VP (VBD had) (NP (JJ big) (NNS losses))))) (CC and) (S (ADVP (RB now)) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ suffers) (ADVP (RB again)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN flood)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (NP (DT some) (ADJP (QP (CD 600) (CD 000))) (NN mu)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNS crops)) (VP (VBN damaged) (PP (IN by) (NP (NN flood))))))) (CC and) (NP (NP (QP (CD 200) (CD million)) (NN kilogram) (NN grain)) (VP (VBN expected) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (VP (VBN lost))))))))))))) (. .)))

sentence.content: Per capita possession of cultivated land in Fujian is only 0.05 mu.

chunking.string: Per capita possession of cultivated land in Fujian

sentence.content: Even if in the normal years, grain output there is not self- sufficient.

sentence.content: The consecutive flood has made agricultural production situation there more grim.

sentence.content: Disaster-relief groups have been sent to the flood-stricken areas striving for minimizing losses.
